thig2.10:1.3: I had not attained peace of mind
thig2.10:1.4: and I had no power over the mind.
thig2.10:2.1: It’s now been the eighth night
thig2.10:2.3: I have obtained the destruction of craving
thig2.10:2.4: and completed the teaching of the Buddha.”
thig2.10:4.1: The Chapter of the Twos is finished.
